task.title: Enable/Disable DND
task.shortdesc: Use DND (Do Not Disturb) to silence your phone and ignore incoming call notifications when you need to avoid distractions.

context.p: When the DND is enabled, your incoming calls will be forwarded to your voicemail. If your Voicemail function is not enabled, the incoming calls will be declined immediately.

p.note: The DND settings on the IP phone has a higher priority than the DND settings on PBX.

step.cmd: Go to Me Extension Settings Other Settings , check the option DND to enable DND.
Uncheck the option DND to disable DND.
